name: 2025 12th International Conference on Bioinformatics Research and Applications
content: Paper Publication: 1\. ICBRA 2025 International Conference Proceedings, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. 2\. 【Special Issue--Impact Factor: 1.9, CiteScore: 5.1】Journal of Integrative Bioinformatics (JIB, ISBN: 1613-4516 ) , indexed by EBSCO, CNKI, DOAJ, Ei Compendex, SCOPUS, ESCI (Web of Science), Google Scholar, PubMed, etc. 3\. For authors who do not want any publication, welcome to submit abstracts only.
